description: Letter dated 10/02/2009 from Beverley Hughes MP to Tim Loughton MP regarding revised figures for numbers of foster placements for children in care. Includes annex of tables showing the number of looked-after children for the year ending 31/03/2008, broken down by number of foster placements, followed by the original incorrect statistics. 9 p.
department: Dept for Children, Schools and Families
